content:
Here's the updated table:

**Loyalty Program** | **Current Points** | **Reward Threshold** | **Reward** | **Rewards Redeemed**
---------------------|------------------|--------------------|-----------|-------------------
Brewed Awakening   | **?**           | 250               | Free Coffee | 
The Daily Grind   | **?**           | ?                  | ?          | 1 free breakfast sandwich (200 points)
PetPal           | 200           | ? (Silver Tier)     | 10% off all purchases | 
SmartMart        | 500           | 500               | $5 discount on next purchase |
StyleHub        | 250           | 250               | $25 gift card (during sale) |
GasGo           | 50           | Varies (Rewards Catalog) | Discounts on gas, car washes, etc. |

It's great that you're starting to build up points at GasGo! Since their rewards catalog offers various redemption options, we can leave the "Reward Threshold" column blank for now. As you earn more points and explore the catalog, you can update the table with specific rewards you're working towards.

Remember to keep tracking your points and update the table regularly. This will help you stay organized and make the most of your loyalty programs.

Which other loyalty programs would you like to add to the table?
